tool_description: Streamline financial calculations in your applications with our Tax Rate by State API. Access current and accurate tax rates for each U.S. state, ensuring compliance and precision in your financial tools, e-commerce platforms, and applications. Seamlessly integrate this API to provide users with real-time tax information tailored to their state, enhancing the reliability and efficiency of your financial applications.
name: Tax Rate by State (U.S)
title: Tax Rate by State (U.S)
